overview: Las vidas de un joven emigrante que se siente a disgusto en la parte menos glamorosa de la Costa Brava, en España, y de un carnicero ante la aparición de un joven que sospecha ser hijo suyo se entrelazan. The lives of a young emigrant who feels uncomfortable in the less glamorous part of the Costa Brava, in Spain, and of a butcher at the appearance of a young man who he suspects is his son, are intertwined.
title: Vacas gordas
